mapper.select: select distinct fileformat as fileformat from j_filetypedetail where flag = false order by ordernum
mapper.sql:
FROM z_asset a LEFT JOIN x_rescourse b ON b.resId = a.id LEFT JOIN x_platform_share c ON (c.shareId = a.id AND c.sharedType = 1 ) LEFT JOIN x_share_resnav d ON c.shareId = d.resId LEFT JOIN x_resourcetype e ON c.sysResourceType = e.id LEFT JOIN j_filetypedetail jf ON a.FileCode = jf.FormatCode AND jf.flag = 0 LEFT JOIN j_user j ON c.userId = j.id LEFT JOIN j_school s ON s.id = j.SchoolId WHERE a.flag = 0 AND b.flag = 0 AND c.flag = 0 AND d.flag = 0 AND e.flag = 0 AND j.flag = 0
and d.structCode like #{tfcode}
and d.codeType = 0
and d.codeType = 1
and ( (c.scope = 'D' and c.scopeId = #{schoolId} ) OR (c.scope = 'C' and c.scopeId=#{districtId} ))
and ( e.id = #{sysResType} or e.pid = #{sysResType} )
mapper.select:
select ty.mType,ty.typeId, count(ty.mType) count from ( SELECT DISTINCT(a.id) id,e.id typeid,e.mtype,jf.fileformat filecode,jf.orderNum,e.displayIndex
) ty group by ty.mType order by ty.displayIndex asc

select pa.fileCode, count(pa.fileCode) count from ( SELECT DISTINCT(a.id) id,e.id typeid,e.mtype,jf.fileformat filecode,jf.orderNum,e.displayindex
) pa group by pa.fileCode order by pa.orderNum asc
mapper.sql:
SELECT DISTINCT(a.id) id,e.id typeId,e.mType,jf.fileformat fileCode,e.displayIndex ,a.name ,a.name title,a.assetpath,a.Notes, a.AssetDesc,a.keyWord,a.IsLocal islocal, 1 beasset,c.createTime,d.structCode, b.courseId teachCourseId,c.clicks, c.quotes,c.downloads,j.TrueName userName, if((SELECT count(resId) from z_rescollection z where z.resId = a.id and a.FileType ='A' and z.fromFlag = 1 and z.flag = 0 and a.flag = 0 and z.userId = 390320126 )>=1,'true','false') collected,
(SELECT count(1) from z_assetevaluate u where u.AssetId = a.id and u.flag = 0 and u.IsScore = 1 and u.aType = 2) contentCount, (SELECT avg(t.ascore) from z_assetevaluate t where t.AssetId = a.id and t.flag = 0 and t.isScore = 0 and t.aType = 0) avgScore,
a.assetsize fsize,a.userId ,j.truename,s.name as schoolname,c.intergral,a.filepath
